verses.text: And the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Why hast \w thou|strong="H4100"\w* \w served|strong="H6213"\w* us \w thus|strong="H1697"\w*, that thou \w calledst|strong="H7121"\w* us not, when thou \w wentest|strong="H1980"\w* to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* with the \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w*? And they did \w chide|strong="H7378"\w* with him \w sharply|strong="H2394"\w*.\f + \fr 8.1 \ft Why…: Heb. What thing is this thou hast done unto us\f*\f + \fr 8.1 \ft sharply: Heb. strongly\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, What have I \w done|strong="H6213"\w* now in comparison of you? \add Is\add* not the \w gleaning|strong="H5955"\w* of the grapes of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than the \w vintage|strong="H1210"\w* of \w Abi-ezer|strong="H0044"\w*?

\w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* into your \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, \w Oreb|strong="H6159"\w* and \w Zeeb|strong="H2062"\w*: and what was I \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* in comparison of you? Then their \w anger|strong="H7307"\w* was \w abated|strong="H7503"\w* toward him, when he had \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H1696"\w*.\f + \fr 8.3 \ft anger: Heb. spirit\f*

¶ And \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \add and\add* passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, he, and the \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* that \add were\add* with him, \w faint|strong="H5889"\w*, yet \w pursuing|strong="H7291"\w* \add them\add*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Succoth|strong="H5523"\w*, \w Give|strong="H5414"\w*, I pray you, \w loaves|strong="H3603"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w follow|strong="H7272"\w* me; for they \add be\add* \w faint|strong="H5889"\w*, and I am \w pursuing|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w* and \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w*, \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*.

¶ And the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Succoth|strong="H5523"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Are\add* the \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* of \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w* and \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w* now in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, that we should \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* unto thine \w army|strong="H6635"\w*?

And \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Therefore when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w* and \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w* into mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, then I will \w tear|strong="H1758"\w* your \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* with the \w thorns|strong="H6975"\w* of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* and with \w briers|strong="H1303"\w*.\f + \fr 8.7 \ft tear: Heb. thresh\f*

¶ And he went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* thence to \w Penuel|strong="H6439"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto them \w likewise|strong="H2063"\w*: and the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Penuel|strong="H6439"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* him as the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Succoth|strong="H5523"\w* had \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \add him\add*.

And he \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* also unto the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Penuel|strong="H6439"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, When I come \w again|strong="H7725"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, I will break \w down|strong="H5422"\w* this \w tower|strong="H4026"\w*.

¶ Now \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w* and \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w* \add were\add* in \w Karkor|strong="H7174"\w*, and their \w hosts|strong="H4264"\w* with them, about \w fifteen|strong="H2568"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \add men\add*, all that were \w left|strong="H3498"\w* of all the \w hosts|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w east|strong="H6924"\w*: for there \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* that \w drew|strong="H8025"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.\f + \fr 8.10 \ft men that…: or, every one drawing a sword\f*

¶ And \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of them that \w dwelt|strong="H7931"\w* in \w tents|strong="H0168"\w* on the \w east|strong="H6924"\w* of \w Nobah|strong="H5025"\w* and \w Jogbehah|strong="H3011"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w host|strong="H4264"\w*: for the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* was \w secure|strong="H0983"\w*.

And when \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w* and \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*, he \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them, and \w took|strong="H3920"\w* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w* and \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w*, and \w discomfited|strong="H2729"\w* all the \w host|strong="H4264"\w*.\f + \fr 8.12 \ft discomfited: Heb. terrified\f*

¶ And \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* from \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w before|strong="H4608"\w* the \w sun|strong="H2775"\w* \add was up\add*,

And \w caught|strong="H3920"\w* a young \w man|strong="H5288"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Succoth|strong="H5523"\w*, and \w enquired|strong="H7592"\w* of him: and he \w described|strong="H3789"\w* unto him the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Succoth|strong="H5523"\w*, and the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* thereof, \add even\add* threescore and \w seventeen|strong="H7657"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.\f + \fr 8.14 \ft described: Heb. writ\f*

And he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Succoth|strong="H5523"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w* and \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w*, with whom ye did \w upbraid|strong="H2778"\w* me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Are\add* the \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* of \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w* and \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w* now in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, that we should \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* unto thy \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \add that are\add* \w weary|strong="H3287"\w*?

And he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w thorns|strong="H6975"\w* of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* and \w briers|strong="H1303"\w*, and with them he \w taught|strong="H3045"\w* the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Succoth|strong="H5523"\w*.\f + \fr 8.16 \ft taught: Heb. made to know\f*
And he beat \w down|strong="H5422"\w* the \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* of \w Penuel|strong="H6439"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

¶ Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he unto \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w* and \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w*, \w What|strong="H0375"\w* manner of \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \add were they\add* whom ye \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* at \w Tabor|strong="H8396"\w*? And they \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, As \w thou|strong="H3644"\w* \add art\add*, so \add were\add* they; each \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w resembled|strong="H8389"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of a \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 8.18 \ft resembled…: Heb. according to the form, etc\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, They \add were\add* my \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add even\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of my \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*: \add as\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, \w if|strong="H3863"\w* ye had saved them \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*, I would not \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* you.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jether|strong="H3500"\w* his \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, \w Up|strong="H6965"\w*, \add and\add* \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* them. But the \w youth|strong="H5288"\w* \w drew|strong="H8025"\w* not his \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: for he \w feared|strong="H3372"\w*, because he \add was\add* yet a \w youth|strong="H5288"\w*.

Then \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w* and \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Rise|strong="H6965"\w* thou, and \w fall|strong="H6293"\w* upon us: for as the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add is, so is\add* his \w strength|strong="H1369"\w*. And \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w* and \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w*, and took \w away|strong="H3947"\w* the \w ornaments|strong="H7720"\w* that \add were\add* on their \w camels’|strong="H1581"\w* \w necks|strong="H6677"\w*.\f + \fr 8.21 \ft ornaments: or, ornaments like the moon\f*

¶ Then the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w*, \w Rule|strong="H4910"\w* thou over us, both thou, and thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and thy \w son’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* also: for thou hast \w delivered|strong="H3467"\w* us from the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*.

And \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, I will not \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* over you, neither shall my \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* over you: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* over you.

¶ And \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, I would \w desire|strong="H7592"\w* a \w request|strong="H7596"\w* of you, that ye would \w give|strong="H5414"\w* me every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* the \w earrings|strong="H5141"\w* of his \w prey|strong="H7998"\w*. (For they had \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w earrings|strong="H5141"\w*, because they \add were\add* \w Ishmaelites|strong="H3459"\w*.)

And they \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, We will \w willingly|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \add them\add*. And they \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* a \w garment|strong="H8071"\w*, and did \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* therein every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* the \w earrings|strong="H5141"\w* of his \w prey|strong="H7998"\w*.

And the \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* of the \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w earrings|strong="H5141"\w* that he \w requested|strong="H7592"\w* was a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \add shekels\add* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*; beside \w ornaments|strong="H7720"\w*, and \w collars|strong="H5188"\w*, and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w* \w raiment|strong="H0899"\w* that \add was\add* on the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, and beside the \w chains|strong="H6060"\w* that \add were\add* about their \w camels’|strong="H1581"\w* \w necks|strong="H6677"\w*.\f + \fr 8.26 \ft collars: or, sweet jewels\f*

And \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* an \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* thereof, and \w put|strong="H3322"\w* it in his \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \add even\add* in \w Ophrah|strong="H6084"\w*: and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* went thither a \w whoring|strong="H2181"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* it: which thing became a \w snare|strong="H4170"\w* unto \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w*, and to his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

¶ Thus was \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w* \w subdued|strong="H3665"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, so that they lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* no \w more|strong="H3254"\w*. And the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* was in \w quietness|strong="H8252"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w*.
¶ And \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in his own \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

And \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* had threescore and \w ten|strong="H7657"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of his \w body|strong="H3409"\w* \w begotten|strong="H3318"\w*: for he had \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*.\f + \fr 8.30 \ft of his…: Heb. going out of his thigh\f*

And his \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w* that \add was\add* in \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, she also \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* him a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* he \w called|strong="H7760"\w* \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w*.\f + \fr 8.31 \ft called: Heb. set\f*

¶ And \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* in a \w good|strong="H2896"\w* old \w age|strong="H7872"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* in the \w sepulchre|strong="H6913"\w* of \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, in \w Ophrah|strong="H6084"\w* of the \w Abi-ezrites|strong="H0033"\w*.

And it came to pass, as soon as \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, that the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* turned \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, and went a \w whoring|strong="H2181"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Baalim|strong="H1168"\w*, and \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w Baal-berith|strong="H1170"\w* their \w god|strong="H0430"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* not the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, who had \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* them out of the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of all their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w*:

Neither \w shewed|strong="H6213"\w* they \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w*, \add namely\add*, \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w*, according to all the \w goodness|strong="H2896"\w* which he had \w shewed|strong="H6213"\w* unto \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
